raw_mentions:
As a result, as shown in Figure 4, an inhibitory effect of α-viniferin on melanin production, which was induced by α-MSH, was indicated as inhibition rate of 8% at a sample concentration of 4 µM, 21% at 6 µM and 63% at 8 µM respectively, and an IC50 value was 7 µM.
On the other hand, in case of arbutin, a control substance, its inhibitory effect on melanin production, which was induced by α-MSH stimulation, was indicated as inhibitory rate of 13% at a sample concentration of 100 µM, 44% at 200 µM and 73% at 400 µM respectively, and an IC50 value was 242 µM.
